p: Leaves (868 g) were hand-cut into small pieces (~ 2 cm) and hydrodistillated for 3 hours in a Clevenger-type apparatus, using n-pentane as collection solvent. The oil was dried by anhydrous sodium sulphate and stored at -30Â°C until chemical analysis and pharmacological tests. The essential oil yield was 17.36 mg (0.002%). To prepare the stock solution for biological studies 2 mg of essential oil were dissolved in 1 ml of dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO).
